Articles.Content:
Hey there,

just registered because I had an idea which I wanted to share with you. I would really like the idea of being able to build a vehicle assembly building in space. I think this would open up new possibilities for missions and spaceship building.

So yeah just my thinking.

Best regards

crushburn

Hello Crushburn,

As stated in the post above mine, orbital structures, such as VABs, are on the What Not To Suggest list. Either way, welcome to the forums!

Locked.
